name: Green Guy Goes Grappling 2 Christmas Shareware Demo
name_original: Green Guy Goes Grappling 2 Christmas Shareware Demo
description: Merry Christmas from me with this festive Green Guy Goes Grappling 2 demo! More info at the end of the game. WASD to move and left click to grapple. This is shareware, so send it to all your friends! Make sure to have fun!
